message.body: Erin! Have you ever made a video piece?

Want to collaborate on a video piece for IcA open call? (Via internet of course.) I want to make something related to my friend's job. She is a painter but is now forced to run those painting nights for yuppies on dates. It seems like prime satire material and also art critical material and also related to naive painting/child painting, which I think you'd be interested in
Sorry this is late night stream of consciousness texting but let me email you some clearer ideas and more info
And see if it's inspiring to you. It would be fun to make something together I think and see it screened at ICA
Yes! I am interested and would love to collaborate with you! Email me some more details/info
Yayayayay!! I have a lot of loose ideas and maybe you will too and I bet we will make something amazing together. I'm feeling *inspired* haha
